metadata.title: CVE-2024-26581 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - high
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_set_rbtree: skip end interval element from gc rbtree lazy gcon insert might collect an end interval element that has been just added inthis transactions, skip end interval elements that are not yet active.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26581` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-11-generic - 6.8.0-11.11
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-11-generic-64k - 6.8.0-11.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-aws - 6.8.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1001-azure - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1002-gcp - 6.8.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-ibm - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-25-lowlatency - 6.8.0-25.25.3
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-25-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-25.25.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1004-oracle - 6.8.0-1004.4
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1004-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1001-raspi - 6.8.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-raspi-realtime package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-2001.1').
